sentences.en: Dobson blames activist judges for undermining families with favourable gay-marriage rulings.
sentences.cn: 多布森责备激进派法官们通过赞成同性婚姻的裁决破坏家庭。

sentences.en: She chronicled her quest on her blog, "Not an activist."
sentences.cn: 她在她的博客上记述了她的追求：“不是一个积极分子。”

sentences.en: Ken Kesey, some of you probably know, was a sort of performer, writer, not really an activist.
sentences.cn: 肯·凯西，你们有些人可能认识，他是一个演员，作家，不是一个真的激进分子。
